code: import'../css/Settings.css';import BackButton from'./BackButton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Settings(_ref){let{setCurrentPage,gameSounds,setGameSounds,audioRef,backgroundMusic,setBackgroundMusic}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Settings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"settingsTitle",children:"Audio Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:gameSounds,onClick:e=>{setGameSounds(!gameSounds);}}),"Game Sounds"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:backgroundMusic,onClick:e=>{setBackgroundMusic(!backgroundMusic);backgroundMusic?audioRef.current.pause():audioRef.current.play();}}),"Background Music"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BackButton,{navigateBack:()=>setCurrentPage("Home")})]});}export default Settings;
